response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. This product, while valued at over $1,000,000 to us, is offered to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. Our team has meticulously designed this solution to cater to your specific needs, ensuring a seamless integration and maximum benefits. We stand behind the quality and reliability of our product, and we are confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision.", "product_price": 850000}
